import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import TopMenu from '../components/TopMenu' import { Link, useRouteMatch, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { getAllEntity } from '../actions' function Entitys(props) { let match = useRouteMatch(); let history = useHistory() const [entitys, setentitys] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { props.getAllEntity() manupilateEntitysData() }) const manupilateEntitysData = () => { let obj let newdata = {} // let expressions for (let i = 0; i < props.entitys.length; i++) { obj = { [props.entitys[i]['type']]: { id: props.entitys[i]['id'], } } newdata = { ...newdata, ...obj } } setentitys(Object.keys(newdata)) } return (

) } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { getAllEntity: () => dispatch(getAllEntity()) } } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { entitys: state.entitys } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(Entitys)
